name: Conga
description:
Vikram wants to dance with Erica. Erica is self-conscious about her dancing unless there are people on the dance floor. Vikram has to get people on the dance floor.

A game of social persuasion and incredibly sick dance moves, Vikram must convince all the party guests at a wedding to populate the dance floor so that he can have a special moment with Erica.

Are you up to the task? Your dancing life depends on it.

Made in January 2016 at the National Theatre School of Canada under the guidance of Jill Murray.
